mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from showoffboard order by board_num desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from showoffboard order by board_num desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum} and board_id = 'id2'
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from showoffboard order by board_rec desc) tt) where rn>=1 and rn<=3
select count(*) as cnt from showoffboard
select count(*) as cnt from showoffboard where board_id = 'id2'
mapper.update: update showoffboard set board_hit = board_hit + 1 where board_num = #{board_num}
update showoffboard set board_rec = board_rec + 1 where board_num = #{board_num}
update showoffboard set board_nrec = board_nrec + 1 where board_num = #{board_num}
